header.title: Subject Prefix
header.description: A MOD that allows users to easily give topics a subject prefix. This may be through a dropdown menu, radio boxes, a custom text input field, etc where a user can select the appropriate option and have it appended to the front of the topic title.
header.author-notes: This MOD is part of the MOD teams "Summer of MODs". This MOD was developed for php 5.2.0 and above, it might work on any other php 5 version but usage on these systems will be unsupported when the php version is causing a problem.

changelog.change: Full rewrite of this MOD.
[Add] Correctly display/handle prefixes when previewing a post.
[Add] Display prefixes in bookmarks.
[Add] Display prefixes in subscriptions.
[Add] Display prefixes in a users "most active topic".
[Add] SubSilver2 support.
[Fix] Allow removal of prefixes through quick edit.
[Add] This MOD now also compatible with Joas his "last post topic title MOD".
[Fix] Correctly display subject prefixes in search results.
Packaging changes after MPV run.
[Change] Some overall changes to make the code more readable.
[Change] Updated UMIL to v 1.0.3.
[Fix] Prefix doesn't get added when using advanced search and show the results per topic.
[Fix] The topic feed breaks when a topic has a prefix set.
[Fix] "Special" searches trigger an error.
[Fix] Support the "PhpBB3 SEO Title" MOD.
[Fix] Remove excess line break when used with the "last post topic title MOD".
[Fix] http://www.phpbb.com/community/viewtopic.php?f=70&t=2091731&start=195#p12848144.
[Fix] #1 Can read forum set to no, in combination with the "Last Post Topic Title MOD" leaks the topics prefix.
[Fix] Correct missing HTML tag in adm/style/acp_subject_prefix.html.
[Fix] #2 When viewing a topic without permissions a debug notice gets printed.
[Fix] #3 Add more describing titles to the contrib .xml files.
[Fix] #4 Fix open path in the subsilver2 installation file.
[Fix] #5 Corrected installation instructions for the "phpBB SEO Title MOD" fix.
[Fix] #7 Prefixes aren't shown in viewforum when a forum contains a sub-forum.
[Fix] #8 Search results don't show prefixes correctly.
[Add] DIY instructions to the subsilver2 install file.
[Add] Instructions to run the installer when updating.
[Fix] The installer couldn't run when the MOD was *installed*.
[Fix] A typo that prevented the prefixes from being displayed in the UCP.
[Fix] #9 The Quick Change box didn't work when the prefix was added to a global announcement.
